trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown to communicate errors to the client when the client connects to non-.NET Framework applications that cannot throw exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 當用戶端連接至無法擲回例外狀況的非.NET Framework 應用程式時，用戶端通訊錯誤擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: ServerException uses the HRESULT COR_E_SERVER, which has the value 0x8013150E.
trans-unit.target: ServerException 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_SERVER，0x8013150E 的值。

trans-unit.source: ServerException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: ServerException 會使用預設<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ServerException, see the ServerException constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ServerException 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱 ServerException 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref>使用預設屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The empty string ("")|
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>類別的執行個體的初始屬性值: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|空字串 ("") |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref>類別具有指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class: |Property Type|Condition| |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string|
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>類別的執行個體的初始屬性值: |屬性類型 |條件 | |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message`字串 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string|
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>類別的執行個體的初始屬性值: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `InnerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InnerException`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
